subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Ken Griffey Jr. is playing at Yankee Stadium for the final time, as a member of the Chicago White Sox. He is not sad to see it go and will not ask for a souvenir.
snippet: Ken Griffey Jr. is playing at Yankee Stadium for the final time, as a member of the Chicago White Sox. He is not sad to see it go and will not ask for a souvenir.
